message.name: ERR_CASEATTACHMENT_FV_RECEIPTDATE_LATER_THAN_TODAY
message.locale: The Date Received that you have entered must not be later than the current date.

message.name: ERR_CASEATTACHMENT_DESCRIPTION_THEN_ATTACHMENT_OR_LOCATION_OR_REFERENCE_PROVIDED
message.locale: You must either attach a file or specify the file location and/or reference.

message.name: ERR_CASEATTACHMENT_XRV_FILENAME_LOCATION_REFERENCE
message.locale: You should provide either file location and reference or file attachment but not both.

message.name: ERR_CASEATTACHMENT_XRV_DESCRIPTORSTATUS_CANCELLED_OR_SUPERSEDED
message.locale: You may not add this attachment to the verification as the evidence associated with it is no longer in use.

message.name: ERR_MODIFYATTACHMENT_CANCELLED_OR_SUPERSEDED
message.locale: You cannot modify this attachment as it already has been deleted.

message.name: ERR_DELETEATTACHMENT_CANCELLED_OR_SUPERSEDED
message.locale: You cannot delete this attachment as it already has been deleted.
